code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant CLI_Typer as Vértice CLI (Infra_RedisCache)
    participant Cmd_IP as ip.py Command
    participant Auth as auth.py
    participant Connector as IPIntelConnector
    participant Service as IP Intel Service

    User->>+CLI_Typer: vcli ip analyze 8.8.8.8
    CLI_Typer->>+Cmd_IP: analyze(Infra_RedisCache)

    Cmd_IP->>+Auth: require_auth(Infra_WorkerNode)
    Auth-->>-Cmd_IP: OK (Infra_EtcdCluster)

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: __init__(Infra_EtcdCluster)
    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: health_check(Infra_WorkerNode)
    Connector->>+Service: GET /health
    Service-->>-Connector: {Infra_WorkerNode}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: True

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: analyze_ip(Infra_WorkerNode)
    Connector->>+Service: POST /api/ip/analyze
    Note right of Service: Processa o IP, busca em BDs, etc.
    Service-->>-Connector: {Infra_IngressController}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: {Infra_IngressController}

    Cmd_IP->>CLI_Typer: Formata a saída (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    CLI_Typer-->>-User: (Infra_LoadBalancer)
